title: Draven Skin 2019
body: Hello there, the last skins we recieve from Draven was Santa Draven, i guess it was in 2017. And bubblehead isnt really a skin, i know he isnt as popular as Lux or Ezreal but he sees some play in League and he is still in the S tier in Botlane in my opinion. Godking would be great, Project would be fine, just anything else than bubblehead and santa claus. hope you will react to it riot <3

replies.body:
I mean, we just got this year's project skins, so project skin isn't possible for draven in 2019

And i'm pretty sure godking Dravenwon't be a thing either 'cause it's quite unique to Garen and Darius and their rivalry, just like Dawnbringer and Nightbringer are unique to Riven and Yasuo as VS event skins

The God-King skins were for the Vs. event in 2018. I get that Draven is Darius's brother, but he himself doesn't exactly have any sort of rivalry with another champion so there'd be no reason to make a Vs. event skin for him let alone recycle the God-King ones.
